mapper.select: SELECT * FROM shanghai WHERE job_name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
select leibie,count(*) as counts from shanghai group by leibie having counts>300
select leibie,avg(zuidi)as zuidi,Avg(zuigao)as zuigao from shanghai group by leibie having count(*)>500
select leibie,count(*) as counts from beijing group by leibie having counts>300
select leibie,avg(zuidi)as zuidi,Avg(zuigao)as zuigao from beijing group by leibie having count(*)>500
select leibie,count(*) as counts from shenzhen group by leibie having counts>300
select leibie,avg(zuidi)as zuidi,Avg(zuigao)as zuigao from shenzhen group by leibie having count(*)>500
select leibie,count(*) as counts from hangzhou group by leibie having counts>300
select leibie,avg(zuidi)as zuidi,Avg(zuigao)as zuigao from hangzhou group by leibie having count(*)>500
select leibie,count(*) as counts from wuhan group by leibie having counts>300
select leibie,avg(zuidi)as zuidi,Avg(zuigao)as zuigao from wuhan group by leibie having count(*)>500
